overview:
Vin is a co-founder of Saavn and currently serves as CEO. Since helping to form the company in 2004, Vin has been instrumental to Saavnâ€™s exponential growth and in a span of less than five years, Saavn has become the largest global business that packages, distributes and promotes Bollywood entertainment for cable, Internet, mobile, and video on-demand services. Saavn has greatly expanded its distribution and aligned with the biggest media companies, including Time-Warner, Cox, Virgin UK, iTunes, Verizon, and countless others.

Vin began his career at Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette (DLJ), where his experiences centered on advising and financing media & telecom companies such as Voyager, Earthlink, and AT&T. After DLJ, he co-founded and served as Director, Sales & Business Development of Simile, a new media software and services company that advised the business units of Time Warner, McClatchy, Scripps, and Hearst.
